verbs.description: [V: roll] [ARG1: em] up turn your lasagna into a masterpiece with this fun twist no need to struggle with that spatula ever again these lasagna rolls are a super elegant way to serve the comfort food lasagna

roll em up [V: turn] [ARG1: your lasagna] [ARG2: into a masterpiece] [ARGM-ADV: with this fun twist] no need to struggle with that spatula [ARGM-TMP: ever] again these lasagna rolls are a super elegant way to serve the comfort food lasagna
